item.title: CVE-2024-35240|2024-05-28T20:15:32.382Z -- umbraco -- Umbraco.Commerce.Issues
item.description: Umbraco Commerce is an open source dotnet ecommerce solution. In affected versions there exists a stored Cross-site scripting (XSS) issue which would enable attackers to inject malicious code into Print Functionality. This issue has been addressed in versions 12.1.4, and 10.0.5. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.
